definitions.example: China keeps down her dissidents very efficiently.
Keep it down in there! Some of us are trying to sleep!

definitions.definition: To cause not to increase or rise.
definitions.example: It is essential to keep the numbers down to avoid overcrowding.
It is difficult to keep anything down when you have the flu.

definitions.definition: To lie low. To stay concealed by not standing up
definitions.example: You had better keep down or they will see you.
